name: Zero Space Left
description:
Zero Space Left is a 2D-Platform game with 8 levels. It is easy until level 6, when the "Tutorial" part of the game ends and the difficult part begins. Not a lot of people have made it past level 6 and even fewer past level 7. Level 8 is not too bad. Happy adventuring!

Speedrun.com link: https://www.speedrun.com/zero_space_left

Controls are explained in the game

Zero Space Left is a small game made by one of my friends for a school project, and i'm here to release it for him. He accepts that i am doing this, so this is not secret. I don't know about development of the game.

v1.1 update:
-Made level 8 harder
-Fixed some glitches with walls
